pr_title: Report deployment status before flipping symlinks in kernel update

timeline.bodyText: Shouldn't this block be after line 299?
timeline.author: fengwang666

replies.bodyText:
I don't think so. If anything breaks before ln294, we can still restart into kernel activate and the ongoing deployment artifacts are needed.
Failing to clean up the ongoing deployment artifacts is not as critical. If we have to process the new deployment or the same deployment again for some reason, the ongoing deployment artifacts will be cleaned up then as well.
replies.author: hui-yang
